metadata.description: Example verification verdict showing attestation failure

errors: Measurement mismatch: expected SIMULATED_MEASUREMENT_ABC123456789DEF, got WRONG_MEASUREMENT_XYZ987654321
Output binding verification failed: Output hash mismatch: evidence claims 9f8e7d6c5b4a3928..., actual is 7a8b9c0d1e2f3a4b...

platform_authentication.note: Platform auth passed but other claims failed

session_binding.possible_cause: Output was tampered with after transformation

action_required: Do not process the transformed context
Investigate potential tampering or replay attack
Check if enclave binary was modified
notes: This verdict indicates multiple security failures.
The output may have been tampered with or the execution environment is compromised.
Immediate investigation is required before accepting any data from this source.
